column4: hmm, will the normal 5.10 AMD64 installer work on a dualcore 3800+ ? The installer loads up fine, and partitions (and unset the bootable flag on my windows partition too), but it doesn't get past 0% on the "Installing base system", says it can't get the packages off the CD, and no apt mirror configured
or do I need to get one with a SMP kernel?
You'll have to get SMP kernel man, like me
It will work without smp just wont use the 2 cpus only 1
